name: strudel-flow
description: A visual drum machine and pattern sequencer built with Strudel and React Flow.

scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.db:push:local: cd apps/backend && wrangler d1 execute strudel-flow-db --local --file=../packages/db/drizzle/schema.sql
scripts.deploy: pnpm -C apps/frontend build && pnpm -C apps/backend run deploy
